overview:
Chris Jeffery is Co-Founder and CEO of LocalUp Solutions, a company he founded in 2009 with Co-Founder Jason Kwicien.

Chris is responsible for the overall direction and strategy of the company, as well as leads all distribution activities of the LocalUp product. Additionally, Chris is heavily involved in product strategy and development.

Prior to LocalUP, Chris was working in the industry and a smaller website in a local community. After having success on a much smaller level, Chris decided to work with Jason and team on a much larger strategy that would accomplish the same hyper-local success he had realized prior to his days at LocalUp.

Chris attended Penn State University where he received a BS in Finance in 2005.
